description: This data set contains the annual attendance figures for facilities operated by the New York State Office for Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation (OPRHP).  The data is organized by OPRHP region and county.

metadata.attribution: New York State Office for Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation (OPRHP)
metadata.description: This data set contains the annual attendance figures for facilities operated by the New York State Office for Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation (OPRHP).  The data is organized by OPRHP region and county.

name: State Park Annual Attendance Figures by Facility:  Beginning 2003
